category.name: Product Structure.PSE Assembly
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PSEAutoViNamePrefix
preference.preference_description: If the PSEAutoViNewItemPopup preference is set to false, this preference defines the naming prefix scheme used for automatic variant item creation. Valid Values: Accepts a single string as a value. The value is used as the prefix of the automatically created variant item. For example, if you set this preference to VI_, when users create a generic item called Wheel, the name of the variant item is VI_Wheel.
